The problem is in the _createDirectoriesFor() method which is trying to create all the way back from root even though it is unlikely that would ever be in an open basedir. Suggestions: quick fix: suppress errors longer term fix: Check if open_basedir restriction is in effect and then try a match to allowed paths, using a matched one as a starting point for directory creation if found.
